root.name: Canvas 2 ~Akane Iro no Palette~
root.description: Canvas 2 is an adult visual novel made by FC, original released for the PC in 2004. A re-release, called Canvas 2 ~Niji Iro no Sketch~ was released for the PS2 in 2006, with none of the adult content. The game spawned both a 24 episode anime series and a manga in 2005.
